header.description: This behaviour pack is the core at which the FalkRaft server runs on, containing the anticheat, custom commands, and optimizations to make the server playable for all low-end devices, while still stopping hackers from ever joining your server.
header.name: FalkRaft Behaviour Pack

modules.description: The custom commands for FalkRaft, and partly the anticheat, and performance optimisations.
The scripts for FalkRaft, containing the anticheat, and the performance optimisations.
